name: Scubadivingpointsguide
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scuba diving points guide
Developer Terms of Use
des:
It's happy to imagine the next scuba diving spots. We introduce the world's best and unknown points. We explain which scenes of creators you can expect in a diving points all over the world, water visibility and conditions and more!

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open Scuba diving points guide” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, open Scuba diving points guide"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open Scuba diving points guide."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the open Scuba diving points guide board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
